Recommendation.title: Resolve High CPU Usage and Resource Constraints

steps.action: Identify the process causing high CPU usage
steps.description: Use system monitoring tools to identify the process(es) consuming excessive CPU resources. This step is essential to pinpoint the root cause of the high CPU usage.

steps.action: Analyze application logs for errors or anomalies
steps.description: Review application logs to detect any errors, warnings, or unusual patterns that may indicate the source of the high CPU usage or resource constraints.
Inspect the application code for inefficient algorithms, memory leaks, or unnecessary resource usage. Update dependencies to ensure they are optimized and up-to-date.
Set up monitoring tools to track CPU, memory, and other system resources in real-time. This helps in identifying performance bottlenecks and preventing future crashes.
If a specific process is identified as the culprit, terminate or limit its resource usage. For services, consider configuring them to run with appropriate resource limits.
If the issue persists, use advanced debugging and profiling tools to trace the application's behavior, identify race conditions, or detect memory leaks.

steps.action: Check for updates or known issues
steps.description: Verify if the issue is known for the specific application or service. Check for updates, patches, or workarounds provided by the vendor or community.
